title: Crime Alert 08.16.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.16.19
description:
Man with the name of a famous car maker makes a living as a car thief. Woman forgets her baby in the car, then forgets her other children in a store. Teen admits to cops he stole a gun.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
